pr_title: EQL: make stringContains function use a wildcard ES query wherever possible

timeline.message:
Make stringContains function use a "wildcard" query for case sensitive
searches

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't this work better in ExpressionTranslators#Scalars where StartsWith is handled?
timeline.author: costin

replies.bodyText: Speaking of, having a rule for CaseSensitiveScalarFunction might work better since it handle the `if (isCaseSensitive && FieldAttribute && foldable) so subclasses would only look at the name and the query while reusing the infrastructure.
replies.author: costin

replies.bodyText: StartsWith is special because is common to SQL and EQL while stringContains, endsWith belong only to EQL. Agree with a separate rule, though.
replies.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText:
This looks wrong - in the case in particular - if the function is StringContains do something, otherwise return null?
Why not make the ExpressionTranslator for StringContains only instead of CaseSensitiveScalarFunction?
timeline.author: costin

replies.author: astefan
